Class IdiotRat

  • java.lang.Object
    • IdiotRat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Animal

    public class IdiotRat
extends java.lang.Object
implements Animal
    A *totally* dumb rat that randomly tries different positions until it finds one to go to This is just a badly designed demonstration rat *DON'T* use this one in your assignment
